name: Auto Theft Car: Gangster Fight
description:
Auto Theft Car: Gangster Fight is a super gangster game to play in the town streets starting with small interesting missions to endless adventure. Gangster city action game to fight with the peoples on the streets. Underworld empire of super auto theft gangster is going to unleash by playing the game and you will be the super gangster hero of this free gangster mafia game.
Features:
Explore awesome 3D crime city environments.
Fly helicopter, drive luxury cars and ride motorbikes.
Cool visual effects and nice graphics.
Steal cars, grab the auto and store in garage.
Smooth, easy, addictive & intuitive gameplay
Amazing attack animations with advanced features
